```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(rootSolve)
library(janitor)
library(tibble)
library(here)
```


```{r}
warming <- read_csv(here("data", "warming.csv"))

damages <- read_csv(here("data", "damages.csv"))
```

```{r}
model_damages <- lm(damages ~ warming, data = damages)
summary(model_damages)
```
